page.title: 10MEDICAL SERVICES IN HOCKWOLD
page.content: Two{Doctors}practising in neighbour- ing villages serve the people of Hockwold.There is{no chemist,}dispens- ing is done from their surgeries, which are held for 1 hr twice weekly. A{district nurse}and{midwife}visit the village as required.Weekly maternity clinics are held in Lakenheath 4 miles away.A health visitor based 3 mls away covers Hockwold.A mobile{Chiropodist} visits infrequently.An unqualified { {Herbalist}advises many villagers.The{ {Hospitals}used are Newmarket,Bury St. Edmunds,King's Lynn & Cambridge.There are very few home confinements.1{Home {Help}works 30 hrs weekly amongst 10 families mostly elderly.3{Social {Workers}are assigned to Hockwold working with the mentally-handicapped, children,teenagers & the elderly.The { {'meals on wheels'}service is supplied from the school as necessary.
